tool_description: Executes validated work order assignments by updating system schedules and sending notifications to technicians and customers.

send_notifications.description: Whether to send notifications to technicians and customers

update_schedules.description: Whether to update technician schedules immediately

error_messages: Assignment execution failed: One or more assignments could not be saved to the system
Notification failure: Assignments saved but notifications could not be sent
Schedule update error: Assignments saved but schedule updates failed
usage: Provide validated assignments to commit them to the system. Disable notifications or schedule updates if needed for batch processing.

execution_status.description: Overall execution result: success, partial, or failed

failed_assignments.description: Assignment IDs that failed to execute
